newsitem.title: UK: Euro jet holds steady, touch of barge tightness.
newsitem.headline: Euro jet holds steady, touch of barge tightness.

text.p: European jet fuel retained strength seen late last week although there was little active trading.
April IPE gas oil last traded 25 cents down at $162 a tonne.
Barge premiums remained firm around May IPE gas oil +$17.50 fob ARA on the back of tightish avails following the spate of cargo deals last week.
Cargo premiums in the North were pegged around the low $20s cif NWE against April IPE gas oil.

In the Mediterranean sellers were holding out for strong numbers. Dealers said in excess of fob high quotes +$10 was being sought for EU spec material while Libyan grade barrels were being offered at fob high quotes +$6-7. Buying interest for the latter was pegged around fob high quotes +$5-6.
